name: Ch15BBaseConvo3
_source: speak;Rennac;Hmm, this desert must be hiding something valuable.|I heard there's ancient treasure buried in these sands...
speak;Knoll;Rennac.|This is not the time for treasure hunting.|Our scouts have reported enemy forces preparing an ambush in this area.
speak;Rennac;An ambush?|That's unfortunate timing.|But surely they wouldn't mind if I collected a few trinkets while we deal with them?
speak;Knoll;How... peculiar.|We face mortal danger, yet you concern yourself with material wealth.
speak;Rennac;My dear Knoll, opportunity waits for no one!|These desert sands have claimed many travelers... and their valuables.|It would be a waste to leave such prizes unclaimed, wouldn't it?
speak;Knoll;The desert claims all eventually. Even treasures.|Our immediate survival takes precedence.
speak;Rennac;Yes, yes, the enemy and all that...|Actually, since you're here, I could use your assistance.
speak;Rennac;Your magic!|Walking through this sand is absolutely dreadful on my boots.|Could you perhaps cast something to make traversing this terrain easier?|A small favor between comrades?
speak;Knoll;You wish me to employ the ancient arts of the Demon King...|for the sake of your footwear?|While death surrounds us?
speak;Rennac;When you put it that way, it sounds quite reasonable!|I knew you'd understand.
speak;Knoll;...|I suppose expediting our movement through this terrain is tactically sound.|Very well.
speak;Rennac;Splendid!|I knew I could count on you.
speak;Knoll;...<purple>By the shadowed veil of Grado's fallen</>, I command the sands to yield...
speak;Rennac;Hey! That incantation sounds rather... ominous.
speak;Knoll;It is done.|I must now prepare our defenses.|The desert is unforgiving to the unprepared, Rennac. Remember that.
speak;Rennac;Such doom and gloom! Always so serious!|Now, where was that glimmer I spotted earlier...

speak;Rennac;With this spell, I'll find twice the treasure in half the time!|My merchant will be impressed when I return with ancient relics!|...Though perhaps I'll neglect to mention how I acquired them.
